name: Quark:Arena
description:
Quark:Arena is the beginning stages of a bigger game I would like to work on,

I am starting with a Arena Game to establish the basics of the char and enemy interaction, as well as the HUD and resource management, my goal is a Scifi First person possible MMO that is based around technology and improvements to your suit in the form of Shield, Armor, Health, oxygen, and Energy levels that need to be maintained while you play. Combined with teleport and Jetpack abilities that would need to be researched and take more energy to use. upgrading Weapons that take more power or are heavier and make you slower.

 rounds up to 10 so far
